title: vue-countable (open-source)
description: Vue binding for countable.js. Provides real-time paragraph, sentence, word, and character counting.

title: file-upload-with-preview (open-source) (for Promosis)
description: A simple file-upload utility that shows a preview of the uploaded image. Written in pure JavaScript. No dependencies. Works well with Bootstrap 4 or without a framework.

title: chrome-ribbon-reminder (open-source)
description: A Chrome extension written using Vue and Async/Await. Uses a popup display and changes badge counts.

title: vue-simple-context-menu (open-source)
description: Simple context-menu component built for Vue. Works well with both left and right clicks. Nothing too fancy, just works and is simple to use.

title: modern-webpack-starter (open-source)
description: A modern JavaScript starter using Webpack 4. Made in a simple way - good for learning or starting a new project without having to rollout cli-auto-builders.

title: vue-cookie-accept-decline (open-source) (for Promosis)
description: Show a banner with text, a decline button, and an accept button on your page. Remembers selection using cookies. Emits an event with current selection and on creation. Good for GDPR requirements.

title: koa-vue-notes-web (open-source)
